title: Status effect

properties.name: description
properties.value: A negative status effect is a condition that impairs the player. Contrary to buffs and with the exception of being skulled or stunned, these status effects could sap the player's health, stats or both. Below is a list of status effects.

content:
A player infected with venom at its maximum damage

A negative status effect is a condition that impairs the player. Contrary to buffs and with the exception of being skulled or stunned, these status effects could sap the player's health, stats or both. Below is a list of status effects.

  • Biting insects
  • Desert heat
  • Disease
  • Extreme cold conditions in the icy area north of Trollheim (e.g. Ice Path and God Wars Dungeon)
  • Extreme heat of the Karuulm Slayer Dungeon floor
  • Gas clouds in the Sulphur mine
  • Poison
  • Skull (status)
  • Stun (status)
  • Swamp decay
  • Venom
rawContent:
[[File:Venomed.png|thumb|A player infected with venom at its maximum damage]]
A negative '''status effect''' is a condition that impairs the player. Contrary to [[buffs]] and with the exception of being [[skulled]] or [[stunned]], these status effects could sap the player's [[health]], [[stats]] or both. Below is a list of status effects.

*[[Light_sources#Consequences|Biting insects]]
*[[Desert heat]]
*[[Disease]]
*Extreme cold conditions in the icy area north of [[Trollheim]] (e.g. [[Ice Path]] and [[God Wars Dungeon]])
*Extreme heat of the [[Karuulm Slayer Dungeon]] floor
*Gas clouds in the [[Sulphur mine]]
*[[Poison]]
*[[Skull (status)]]
*[[Stun (status)]]
*[[Swamp decay]]
*[[Venom]]

[[Category:Mechanics]]
